title: Rule Resource Type

rule.description: The rule itself, expressed as a string in the ABNF format specified

rulecategory.description: The category of Rule. If absent, the default value is normal

ruleresult.description: The boolean result of evaluating the rule with the current inputs

ruleenable.description: If true, the rule result is updated whenever any rule input is updated

actionenable.description: If true, actions are triggered on ruleenable value transition from false to true

priorityenable.description: If true, the priority mechanism is processed.
